lyrics:
3 contributorshands on you lyricschorus
when i get my hands on you
im gonna do every little everything
anything girl that you want me to
and when its finally just you and me

wanna make you go crazy baby
when i get my hands on you
aint nothin in the world gonna slow me down

verse 1
ive been waitin on this for such a long long time
ive been waitin on a chance girl to make you mine
your bodys burnin me turnin me inside out
i want you so bad all that i can think about
